  • Method Details

    • compile

      public static void compile​(java.io.File sourceFile) throws java.io.IOException, java.net.URISyntaxException, CishCompileException
      It compiles the given java file, which represents the java version of the origin cish file

      It extracts all jar files (jarToDir(File)), copied the internal lang library to the dir (copyLangClasses(File) and finally compiles the jar file

      Parameters:
      sourceFile - file representation of the java file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - error when copying files.
      CishCompileException - error when compiling the java file
      java.net.URISyntaxException - something strange happened when trying to access the executed file itself
